entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
